content:
PasswordEncodingMethod Enum

Definition

Specifies whether SSL is used when you set or change a password. This enumeration is used with the stem.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntryConfiguration.PasswordEncoding* property.

In this Article

public enum PasswordEncodingMethod
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
PasswordEncodingMethod

Fields

PasswordEncodingClear

Passwords are not encoded and are transmitted in plain text.
PasswordEncodingSsl

Passwords are encoded using SSL.
